runs.comm: slides down the leg side and makes a dent in the extras column straight up
good length and in line with off stump this time, shows it the full face of the bat
length ball, on the stumps, forward defensive ... Rampaul thinks it was pad first. It might have been but height was also a question
length and Kieswetter tries to launch this one out of the park, the ball instead looping just over mid-on running back
straight, good length, nudged wide of mid-on
length delivery, swivel pulled to midwicket - they only get one, even though Chris Gayle slips over whilst backing up
on the stumps, ticked into the leg side
full and straight, dug out to mid-on
full and straight, chipped towards midwicket - Edwards had overstepped though
Hales steps away, Edwards follows him with a vicious bumper and practically sits the batsman on his behind - that's one way to deal with a free hit
back of a length outside off, Hales opens the face but doesn't connect
length ball on the stumps, shovelled through square leg and the fielder has to run around to cut it off
fast and climbing from back of a length, Kieswetter backs away but misses with a swishy cut
pitched up and straighter, worked wide of mid-on

back of a length and pulled straight to the man at deep backward square leg! Kieswetter hadn't look convincing trying to clear the ropes and he got nowhere near on this occasion, with a tame scoop to the fielder running in
first ball to Bopara is a wide down the leg side
length ball outside off, pushed into the covers
shorter and slapped to point, the throw to the non-striker's end is a direct hit and they run as the ball deflects away

short ball and Hales times this, hooking aerially for the first boundary of the innings to the same part of the park where Kieswetter perished - but Hales knows this ground a bit better and gets it all the way over the rope
fuller length, play and a miss outside off
too straight and flicked off the hips for a couple into the leg side
pitched up on the stumps, worked off the legs through square
touch short, steered down to third man
full and outside the line of off, punched coming forward to mid-off and they set off straight away for a quick single
bumper, targeting the batsman, Hales takes evasive action to avoid a bang on the bonce
length ball whipped through midwicket from around middle stump
dropped short and pulled round the corner to deep backward square
full and straight, glanced through square leg
pitched up on the stumps, Bopara mishits a drive but the ball runs away short on the off side and they get one anywa
back of a length, Hales quickly into position to pull but gets a bottom edge into his boot and Rampaul fields
banged in short and Hales uses the pace to shovel a hefty blow a few yards back over the boundary at deep backward square
good response from Rampaul, a yorker tailing on around off and the batsman has to jam down on it
pitched up on off again and squeezed out to point for one
short of a length to start with and Hales rocks back to smack the ball through the covers for four
flighted a bit more, on the stumps and played with the spin towards midwicket
tossed up outside off, Bopara reaches for it but his drive finds Sammy at cover
flighted, drifting down the leg side, can't get it away
drags his length down as Bopara comes forward, forcing him to improvise and dab overarm into the leg side
on the stumps and clipped through midwicket
full toss on leg stump and carted low through midwicket to a vacant part of the field
slower ball, wide of off stump, waits on it and dabs to point
slow, low full toss, Hales almost falls over chopping the ball through square on the leg side
wide and a touch short, batted away through point and a misfield from Simmons means they get two
pitched up outside off and driven with a flourish towards wide long-on - that's the 50 up
slower bouncer, wide of the stumps, Hales had stepped away and has to stretch to pat the ball behind point
tossed up, on off and spinning across, pushed on the front foot back past the bowler to long-on
chopped back to Narine from in front of off
length ball, cut through point to the sweeper
flighted, on the stumps, Bopara plays this on the walk to long-on
tossed up and this one goes straight on outside off, beating Hales swish
on the stumps, not much turn, worked into a gap on the leg side and they run hard for two
full and slow, nurdled out towards deep midwicket
on the stumps, clipped into the deep on the leg side
length ball, wide of the stumps, dabbed through point
slower ball, just outside off and driven into the ground, the ball bouncing over Bravo's outstretched arm on its way down to long-on
another slower ball and Hales picks this, bunting the ball back over wide long-on - it didn't go as far as any of Smith's but a six is a six is a six
yorker outside off, Hales can't get anything on it this time
down the leg side, plopped short off the pad
rolls his fingers over the ball, Hales beaten outside off
length outside off, pushed through the covers
floated up, Bopara walks out to meet it and punches down the ground
tight line, squirted into the off side
length ball on the stumps, dribbled down to long-on
slapped off the toe down to long on, so slowly they will take two
slapped towards midwicket this time, oh dear a bad misfield by Smith, sliding and letting the ball squirm under him for four, poor work
another sweep attempted, this time off an edge to 45
big shot from Bopara, onto one knee and a heave with the wind over cow corner for six, excellent stroke into the crowd
cut out to deep cover
length ball chipped down to long off
length ball, leading edge down the ground, they rightly refuse the second run
tucked through square leg and they charge back for the second
short outside off but Bopara only finds cover
step away and cut through point for four, superb timing
pushed down to long on
off stump and ran back to the bowler
off stump back of a length and pulled out to deep midwicket
slapped straight up and it lands between three fielders, now that is lucky, huge top edge lands safe
cut to the cover sweeper
down the track, a terrible hack takes an inside edge in between the keeper's legs just past off stump for four
leg stump, clipped between deep square leg and deep midwicket, takes a couple
back of a length, inside edge into the body
bottom edged pull behind square on the leg side
steps away and guides it for four to third man, fine stroke
knee high full toss and ran down to long on, should that have found the stand though
cut into the deep, Smith around to field, did he miss out again there?
step away and push down to long off
full and dug to short third man
rapid inswinger, comes off the pad to short third man, fine delivery
fired in again and off the pad for more runs
bumper and ducked
full toss and slapped down to long on with another mis-hit really but they still take two
bumper and a hook that comes off a top edge and sails into the boundary hoardings, he didn't try to hit it too hard just helped it along the way
whipped out to deep square leg
back of a length but only hit towards long off
punched back down the ground having given himself room, Sammy fields, goes to throw and then chucks it behind him! Bizarre and another run
step away and this time struck fabulously over extra cover, great stroke
gives himself room again but Samuels followed him and Bopara plays it back to him
massive hit again but only four to the huge leg side boundary, he got hold of it but into the wind and one bounce for four
but another dot, ran back to the bowler once more
wild beamer and it evades Ramdin and goes for four
length outside off and clipped to midwicket
yorker length ball, angled to short third man
full again, dug into the on side and Gayle just about saves two
clipped out through square leg and they run really well for two more
a swing from outside off stump and missed
leg side, clipped down to long leg where there is a lovely save by the fielder with one hand
tucked out to deep point
pulled and a drop at midwicket, it was a very tough high chance but he mistimed the jump and put it down
cut out through point again, just for one
flick of the wrists wide of deep cover so two this time
lifted down the ground for a single only to long off
fired down the leg side, is that a wide? Must have clipped the pad
slugged through leg side from a full ball outside off, and it runs for four! Great placement
he was stood outside off stump to give him room to swing to leg and he does so, behind square and gets four to backward square leg, poor bowling but great thinking from Bopara
full and an inside edge to the 45, they take one
full toss and a chip down the ground lands well in front of long on, they take two
full toss outside off, craved out to deep point
gone! And Hales is denied a hundred, bowled middle stump. It's a great delivery, full and straight and cleans up the timbers as Hales looked to go leg side
full and carved to cover
slugged away through midwicket, they take two behind deep midwicket
slapped down the ground and caught at long off! Went to finish it in one hit, it's off the toe of the bat down the throat of the fielder. He didn't catch it at all and it was a simple catch
full toss outside off, slapped to mid off, oh there's a misfield! And they're coming back, and England win!!
